394:2: valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma|
394:3: dṛṣṭvā ca sāntaḥpuraparivāraiḥ sārdhamanekairasuraśatasahasraiḥ kubjavāmanakādibhiḥ sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma–
394:4: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca|
394:5: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham ||
394:7: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ |
394:10: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ |
394:18: valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha– api ca|
394:21: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava|
394:25: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
394:27: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
394:30: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ ||
394:31: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha-ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
394:34: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti|
394:40: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
394:41: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
394:49: mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti|
394:52: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
394:54: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
394:56: te'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
394:58: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum|
394:59: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
394:60: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ|
394:65: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt|
394:68: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
394:69: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi adhastādupagataḥ ūrdhveṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa ca|
394:72: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ|
394:75: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
394:76: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ |
394:77: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
394:78: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
394:79: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
394:80: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?)
394:82: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum ||
394:83: athe balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato'
394:84: valokiteśvarasyāntikātpiṇḍapātrakuśalabhūtasya sukṣetrāvarūḍhabījapātrabhūtasya nirdeśyamānasya tatsarvamanumodya sāśrudurdinavadano gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam,
394:90: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham,
394:91: tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ|
394:92: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni marakatapralambitāni cāmarapralambitāni muktāhārāṇi muktikājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni muktikākalāpajālāṅgulīkāni sauvarṇaghaṇṭikārūpyanibaddhāni raṇaraṇāyamānāni, (anyāni ca)
394:93: kapilāsahasrāṇi rūpyapādāni sauvarṇaśṛṅgāni muktājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni arghapātrasamāyuktāni nānāvicitraghaṇṭāratnasamāyuktāni,
394:95: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ kanyālakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtānāṃ paramarūpaśobhamānāmapsarasāmapi pratispardhinīnāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmaparikṣepikāṇāṃ keyūrakaṭakanūpurakaṭimekhalāhastottaryā karṇapṛṣṭhottaryā hastāṅgulīyasamāyuktānāṃ sarasarāyamāṇamālāsamāyuktānāṃ nānāraṅgoparaktavastraprāvṛtānām, (anyāni)
394:101: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni |
394:105: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam|
394:107: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ|
394:110: etatpaurvikaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi-kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ|
394:111: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ|
394:112: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni|
394:113: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni|
394:123: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni|
394:131: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa|
394:134: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ|
394:135: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati sma yudhiṣṭhiranakulasahadevabhīmasenārjunakauravādibhiḥ|
394:136: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ|
394:139: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni|
394:142: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti- atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ?
394:145: atha te kathayanti-varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam|
394:150: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ|
394:152: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi,
394:153: tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam|
394:175: śukra uvāca- jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā|
394:177: atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati|
394:185: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam|
394:187: atha śukro balimetadavocat-rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ|
394:188: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam |
394:195: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam|
394:198: tadā sa kathayati-tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate|
394:201: atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat-yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam|
394:202: atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat-yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham|
394:208: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ|
394:209: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni|
394:211: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede-dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya|
394:214: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ|
394:215: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan-bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi|
394:218: athe balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ- trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta|
394:240: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti|
394:245: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro balerindrasya vyākaraṇamanuprayacchati sma-bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra śrīrnāma tathāgato'
394:246: rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
394:248: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati|
394:251: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca ||
394:252: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ- śṛṇu mahārāja|
394:253: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān,
394:256: ajñānāste sattvā ye putradāradārikāmanuvicintayanti bhāryāṃ mātāpitarau|
394:262: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti |
394:265: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante|
394:270: tataḥ kṣuradhāropacitānmahāpathādavatīrya yatra ṣoḍaśāṅgulipramāṇāni kaṇṭakāni tatrānīyate,
394:271: tata ekaikapāde pañca pañcaśatāni kaṇṭakāni praviśanti|
394:277: na ca tvayā kvaciddānāni dīyamānāni dṛṣṭvānumoditāni|
394:278: na ca tvayā kvacit pradeśe stūpabimbāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtāni|
394:283: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti|
394:284: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
394:285: dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
394:286: tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati|
394:287: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti|
394:292: kaṇṭhamapi tālumapi hṛdayamapi yantravatkalā nigaḍāyamānā sarvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ dahyante|
394:293: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke |
394:294: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam|
394:295: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha-apramattena bhavitavyam,
394:302: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni|
394:305: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati|
394:307: mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt imaṃ sarvaduḥkhapāpaskandhaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ sarvadurgatisādhanaṃ anantamaṇimahāpuṇyanirdeśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānaṃ sūtraratnarājaṃ tvaṃ śroṣyasi,
394:308: śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
394:311: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ samāśvāsya idamavocat-gamiṣyāmyaham|
